definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swallow (greedily) (NH id., Hiph. stuff cattle with food; Syr. luw9t.o0 jaw; cf. Ar. lagat.a speak confusedly, utter indistinct sounds);—only

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Imv. ms. sf. causat, [[הַלְעִיטֵנִי]] Ge 25:30 (J) let me swallow, sq. [[מִן]] rei.
